StringTable.Label: FACTION_DLC_SNATHI_Dec
StringTable.String: The most Evil sect of an already Evil race, the Snathi Revenge, has spent the last millennia imprisoned by the precursors on a distant world. Free at last, they will show the galaxy the true face of Evil.

StringTable.Label: FACTION_DLC_SNATHI_LeaderDec
StringTable.String: The leader of the Snathi, Lord Snarky is known for having a mind as sharp as his teeth.

StringTable.Label: FACTION_DLC_SNATHI_StartupDescription
StringTable.String:
The most E-V-I-L sect of an already Evil race, the Snathi Revenge, has spent the last millennia imprisoned by the Precursors on a distant world. With the fall of the Dread Lords, the Snathi are finally free to lay waste to a galaxy of lesser beings and foes.
In the name of their creators, the Dread Lords, the Snathi will show the galaxy the true face of fear.

StringTable.Label: FACTION_DLC_SNATHI_StartupTraitsDescription
StringTable.String: The Snathi are the ultimate scavenger race. They quickly learn how to piece together any technologies that they come across and can repair the most damaged vessels at a rate unheard of by other races. The Snathi are also known for cherry-picking the technologies of other races and using them for their own nefarious purposes.
